members.signatureBeforeChange: public static File createAndAddAnnotationJar( IJavaProject project ) 		throws IOException, JavaModelException
members.signatureAfterChange: public static File createAndAddAnnotationJar( IJavaProject project ) 		throws IOException, JavaModelException
diff: +			// The jar file will be created in the state location, e.g., .metadata/
+				// We're in a dev environment, where we jar up the classes from the plugin project
+				// We're in a releng environment, where we copy the already-built jar
+				File aptJarFile = getFileInPlugin( AptTestsPlugin.getDefault(), new Path("/apt.jar"));
+					throw new FileNotFoundException("Could not find apt.jar file in org.eclipse.jdt.apt.tests plugin");
